name: Lass
text: You and your opponent show each other your hands, then shuffle all the Trainer cards from your hands into your decks.

effect.text: You and your opponent show each other your hands, then shuffle all the Trainer cards from your hands into your decks.

strengths: Removes all Trainers from both hands
synergies: Imposter Professor Oak - Use after they draw
counters: Decks that don't rely heavily on Trainers

competitiveHistory: Lass was a key disruption card, often used in combination with Imposter Professor Oak to strip opponents of their Trainers after forcing a fresh hand.

rulings.ruling: Both players must reveal their entire hands.
All Trainer cards in both hands are shuffled into their respective decks.
Pokemon and Energy cards remain in hand.
